casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Kenneth Lee BOYD. No. 547A88-5. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 29, 2005. A. Danielle Marquis, Assistant Attorney General, Belinda J. Foster, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 28th day of November 2005 by Defendant for Stay of Execution:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 29th day of November 2005."
